description:
Kuukai`s childhood friend who is very skilled at playing the piano. Her strong point is jazz music. She plans on going to school to study piano, but she must leave her hometown to do so. Although she wants to follow her dream she is anxious and hesitant about leaving.
Before her departure, Shion hears Utau`s song and her heart`s egg is pulled out, becoming a X Tama. Amu is able to heal it with the help of Kuukai. The next day, Amu and Kuukai go to the train station to see Shion off, and it is revealed that Kuukai might just have feelings for Shion, even though she is approaching her 19th birthday.
name: Shion
